parameters.definition: Total units of medicinal ingredients available
Units of medicinal ingredients required for a large pill
Units of filler required for a large pill
Units of medicinal ingredients required for a small pill
Units of filler required for a small pill
Minimum large pills to be produced
Minimum percentage of total pills to be small pills

description: A lab has \param{TotalMedicinalUnits} units of medicinal ingredients to make two pills, a large pill and a small pill. A large pill requires \param{LargePillMedicinalUnits} units of medicinal ingredients and \param{LargePillFillerUnits} units of filler. A small pill requires \param{SmallPillMedicinalUnits} units of medicinal ingredients and \param{SmallPillFillerUnits} units of filler. The lab has to make at least \param{MinimumLargePills} large pills. However, since small pills are more popular at least \param{MinimumSmallPillsPercentage} of the total number of pills must be small. How many of each should be made to minimize the total number of filler material needed?
